title: Ticket #7478: QueryOpts enum doc incomplete
description:
The htcondor.QueryOpts enum in the Python Bindings is only partially documented -- GroupBy, DefaultMyJobsOnly, SummaryOnly, and IncludeClusterAd are listed but have no text.

https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/v8_9_5/apis/python-bindings/api/htcondor.html#htcondor.QueryOpts
remarks:
